medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Album of miniature landscape paintings, from a double album set
description: dark wood covers with gold and black label on front; twelve miniature paintings, five with text on opposite pages; eight landscapes in color-four in black and white; three seals in margin of first landscape, three seals in margin on page opposite last painting; page of text with seal on gold flecked paper after last painting
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund
